EngLawName: Regulations for the Administration of Responsible Persons of Satellite Broadcasting Businesses
LawName: 衛星廣播電視事業負責人監督管理辦法
EngLawHistories: 1.5 Articles promulgated in full by on Novermber 21 of 2016 according to Letter Tong-Chuan-Nei-Rong No.10548033810 by National Communications Commission

EngLawArticles.EngArticleContent: These Regulations are hereby enacted pursuant to Paragraph 3, Article 10 of the Satellite Broadcasting Act (hereinafter referred to as the Act).
Responsible persons of satellite broadcasting businesses refers to directors, supervisors, general managers, chief executive officers, or persons with similar duties.

The general manager, chief executive officer, or a person with similar duties of satellite broadcasting businesses shall meet at least one of the following qualifications:
1. Those graduated from a vocational college, college, university, or higher, recognized by the Ministry of Education, or who have equivalent education; or
2. Those with other evidence, sufficient to prove having professional knowledge or operational management capabilities or who have an adequate amount of experience.
These Regulations shall take effect from the date of promulgation.
